abstract: Microsoft’s Steve Ballmer will unveil a slate P.C. made by Hewlett-Packard at the Consumer Electronics Show, according to people familiar with Microsoft’s plans.
snippet: Microsoft’s Steve Ballmer will unveil a slate P.C. made by Hewlett-Packard at the Consumer Electronics Show, according to people familiar with Microsoft’s plans.
lead_paragraph: It could be one of Steve Ballmer’s riskiest trade-show moves in years.

headline.main: Microsoft and H.P. to Reveal Slate PC Ahead of Apple
